name: Elevated Ceramic Dog Bowl Set - Raised Dog Bowls with Non-Slip Bamboo Stand - Dog Food and Water Bowl Set - Double Dog Feeding Bowls - Suitable for Small and Medium Dogs - 28.74 OZ - 3.6 CUPS - 850 ML
short_description: Scientific Feeding for Healthy Diet: The elevated dog bowls allow to eat and drink comfortably without bending over too much, reducing pressure on the joints. At the same time, the raised feeding station reduces food contamination from dust and small bugs, keeping food clean and hygienic.

Made for Cats and Dogs: Our pet bowl set comes in two sizes. The 5-inch dog feeder bowl holds 16.23 ounces/2 cups and fits most cats and small dogs. And the 6-inch dog feeding bowl holds 28.74 ounces / 3.6 cups and is suitable for small to medium-sized dog.

Selected High Quality Material: Each dog food bowl and dog water bowl is made of premium food grade ceramic, lead free and cadmium free, non-toxic and harmless, strong and anti-bite. And the dog bowl stand is made of natural bamboo, safe, sturdy and eco-friendly.

Anti-Slip and Anti-Tipping: Each leg of the bamboo stand is equipped with rubber pad stickers to prevent the bowls from sliding when pets eat. And the thick ceramic dog dish bowl is heavy enough and stable enough, not easy to pushed down by naughty pets.

Versatile and Easy Cleanup: Perfect for dry food, wet food, water, fresh food and snack. The detachable design makes it easy to carry, clean and store. And the double ceramic dog bowls are dishwasher safe and microwave safe. Regarding the maintenance of the bamboo stand, just wipe it with a dry rag.

short_description: WHISKER FRIENDLY WITH SHALLOW DISH: Whisker Fatigue results from the over-stimulation of the whiskers. It happens commonly during mealtime to cats such as Persian, Exotic shorthair cat, and flat-faced animals. Our detachable bowl is designed in shallow dish which keeps food centered and not pushed to the side with no more spillover. It’s easy for your cat to eat out of, instead of burying its nose and triggering WHISKER STRESS.
PROVIDES COMFY MEALTIME POSITION: Patented slanted and elevated foundation design makes pet more comfortable accessing their food and water without bending over.

NON SLIP WEIGHTY BASE PREVENTS MOVING AND TIPPING OVER: Rubber non-slip base can effectively reduce sliding on the floor protecting from scratching. Flat, weighty bottom design can prevent pets tipping the bowl over.

REMOVABLE SHALLOW DISH: Big wide oval design makes sure food keeps centered and prevents overfeeding. The removable dish is easy to clean so you don’t have to take the whole thing to the dishwasher. We prioritize your pet’s health and safety with high standard testing to ensure the products are food grade certified.

Felli | SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: We make sure the product you receive are made with the high quality, patented technology, coupled with durable and functional features, to ensure the best value for your dollar. If you have an issue with Felli product, feel free to reach out. We are here to help!

Keeps the Bowl and Feeding Area Clean: Using the elevated bowl can keep your feeding station orderly and clean. Besides, raised dog bowls prevent dust, debris, and dog hair from coating your dog’s bowl, keeping it cleaner and hygienic.

Easy to Use Anti-slip Stand: Elevated pet bowls with antislip feet make it stable and prevent sliding, offering protection for your floors also. Noise-free rubber rim for your dog to enjoy quiet dining. Fold and store the legs with a simple push of a button after use.

name: SPOT Hi Rise Single Diner Elevated Dog Feeder, 2qt Stainless Steel Bowl, Durable Wire Stand, Hygienic, Easy to Clean, Promotes Proper Posture for Tall Pets, Ideal for Medium and Large Breeds, 14.25in
short_description: DURABLE DOG BOWL: With a sleek, hand-crafted design, this durable 15” tall, elevated dog bowl wire stand acts as both a pet bowl stand and a modern piece of home décor
VERSATILE FEEDING OPTIONS: The included stainless steel dog bowl dish can be removed and used separately, offering convenient portability to travel with your pet on the go

PROMOTES HEALTH: The high-rise design promotes health for medium, large and giant breed dogs and is strategically designed for pets with medical conditions, encouraging proper posture to better aid digestion
STAINLESS STEEL BOWL: For the safety and health of your pet, the 2-quart size stainless steel bowl is hygienic and easy to clean; just throw in the dishwasher and you’re done
EASY ASSEMBLY: The easy snap-in assembly requires no tools, and the dog feeding station is lightweight enough to easily move within your home for convenient feeding
product_description: SPOT by Ethical Products Hi-Rise Single Elevated Dog Bowl offers all of the features you want in an elevated dog bowl without any costly extras. Featuring a durable wire stand that is also lightweight and easy to move, the high-rise design allows the 2-quart size stainless steel bowl to stand a full 15” from the floor, making it ideal for medium, large and giant dog breed sizes to comfortably enjoy their meals. The elevated height helps your dog eat with a more natural posture which can promote healthy digestion. The Hi-Rise Dog Bowl simply snaps together with no tool assembly required. For easy maintenance, simply remove the bowl from the stand and throw it into the dishwasher for quick and easy cleaning. Established in 1952, Ethical Products in New Jersey continues to provide pet owners and their pets with the absolute best consumer value and customer service in the pet industry while never losing sight of quality, innovation, safety, honesty and humanity.
